design_strategy.core_concept: Swiss Clarity meets Code Editor Aesthetics. A portfolio that feels like a well-structured codebase: clean, efficient, and powerful.
design_strategy.archetype: The Performance Pro (Archetype 2) mixed with Swiss High-Contrast (Archetype 4)
design_strategy.visual_style: Clean professional UI with soft blue accents. High readability, generous whitespace, and subtle motion.

layout_system.grid_strategy: Bento Grid (Mode A) for Projects and Skills
layout_system.spacing: Generous. Use p-8 to p-12 for section padding. Gap-6 to Gap-8 for grids.
layout_system.alignment: Left-aligned headings for strong hierarchy. Asymmetrical balance in Hero section.

buttons.primary: rounded-full px-8 py-6 text-lg font-medium shadow-lg shadow-blue-500/20 hover:scale-105 transition-transform
buttons.secondary: rounded-full px-8 py-6 text-lg font-medium border-2 border-slate-200 dark:border-slate-800 hover:bg-slate-50 dark:hover:bg-slate-900

cards.style: bg-white dark:bg-slate-900 border border-slate-100 dark:border-slate-800 rounded-2xl overflow-hidden hover:border-blue-200 dark:hover:border-blue-800 transition-colors

navigation.style: fixed top-0 left-0 right-0 z-50 backdrop-blur-md bg-white/80 dark:bg-slate-950/80 border-b border-slate-200/50 dark:border-slate-800/50

effects.scroll_reveal: WhileInView: opacity 1, y: 0. Initial: opacity 0, y: 50

images.usage: Hero section background or side visual

images.description: Coffee shop aesthetic for PHP project

assets.icons: Use react-icons (FaGithub, FaLinkedin, FaEnvelope, FaPhone, SiHtml5, SiCss3, SiJavascript, SiFlutter, SiDart, SiPhp, SiMysql, SiLinux, SiPython, SiCplusplus)

instructions_to_main_agent: CRITICAL: The user asked for 'static HTML', but the environment is configured for React. You MUST build this as a React Single Page Application (SPA) to ensure it runs correctly in the provided container.
Implement a 'Dark/Light Mode' toggle using Tailwind's 'dark' class strategy.
Create a 'Resume' button that links to a dummy PDF path (e.g., '/resume.pdf') or opens a 'Coming Soon' toast.
Ensure the 'Skills' section uses a responsive grid or a wrapping flex layout with badges.
The 'Education' and 'Experience' sections should use a vertical timeline layout.
Use 'sonner' for the Contact form submission feedback (mocked).
Do NOT use purple or teal as primary colors. Stick to the Blue/Slate palette.
Ensure all text has sufficient contrast in both light and dark modes.
universal_guidelines: Create depth through layered design elements.
Use glass-morphism effects for the navbar.
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable.
